tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are very happy that we got treatment from Dr Jasmin.From the day one, we are consulting Dr jasmin till the delivery of my twin babies. She is polite and understands each and evey situation and accordingly performs the treatment. My twins are safe and recovering well today due to Dr jasmin. I dont have words to express the way she handled the situation at the time of delivery of my babies. Personnely and professionally she is very helping and provide her support throught the journey. 
I would like to thank Dr jamsin for her support and would like to refer this doctor for their preganancy realted treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
Dr Jasmine has been very friendly, she listens very patiently and she will not be oberwhelmed to handle the first pregnancy excitement.

She will not over complicate any complaint that we face during pregnancy and believes in natural treatment.

She has encouraged me during every visit towards natural and normal delivery. She never gave any additional medicines but just iron and calcium.

I have reached 39weeks and when I still has not got pains, she has done a 5secs method of stripping and next day early morning baby started making way out.

I am fortunate to consult her and I happily delivered a baby boy very smoothly and labour went only for 15mins. I truly recommend and give credit to Jasmine doctor for a Miraculous journey towards motherhood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hailing from North and having found ourselves  pregnant,  me and my husband were in search of a good gynaec in Hyderabad as we did not know any doctors here. After going through a lot of reviews online,  we thought of visiting Dr. Jasmin, which I think was our best decision. I am consulting her since 3months now and she makes sure to answer all our questions and makes us feel at ease.  She made sure not to call me to visit frequently amidst the covid times.So far,  my initial months have not been easy but she is extremely generous and guides you correctly everytime you visit her.From my experience,  she is all you'll need to be the supporting pillar in your pregnancy too. We are glad to have found her.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Did not explain issue properly, forgetful doctor doesn't remember what happened in previous visits, **** ** *********** ****** didn't explain issues properly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Jasmin Rath is no less than a magician. my wife was diagnosed with gestational hypertension and needed to deliver the baby urgently. The way Jasmin mam managed our high risk pregnancy case shows how confident and experienced lady she is. These days its difficult to get a personal touch with a doctor but Jasmin mam made us very much comfortable, explained us the entire situation and gave us courage. Not only she delivered the baby successfully but also she managed to keep my wifes hypertension post delivery on check. She made a genuine effort to meet my wife and the baby personally everyday to keep a check on them. She is a thorough professional with a human touch. I would highly recommend Jasmin mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Adenomyosis Treatment,Endometriosis Treatment,D&C (Dilation and Curettage),Breast Examination,
review:
Hi doctor this is Anuradha.......She is a doctor with a heart of gem .She is too friendly,loving and caring .Doctor explains everything very nicely .I went to
her initially for my chronic breast abscess but due to her approach i opened up about my other multiple health issues I had been facing after my second delivery.I was in so much of pain due to all those specifically my heavy painful bleeding and abdominal pain .She spontaneously did all the tests personally and made a conclusion of surgery was the option.For me she has given a new life and thank you is such a small word for expressing my gratitude towards her........
reply_text: Thanks Anuradha. U r a wonderful person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Ive been consulting doctor since two yrs ,she is friendly and humble. Right from start of my pregnancy she has taken extreme care  in each trimester, just before my delivery i got viral fever, she has monitored me and baby day and night and delivered successfully, Me and Baby are healthy ,I really appreciate the care and concern shown by her, Her presence  itself gives lot of positivity and confidence.
reply_text: Thanks Priyanka for ur nice gesture. U and ur family are good at heart .God bless you and ur family .

tags: None
review: We consulted Dr. Jasmin for my wife's pregnancy. *** ** * ***** ****** *** * **** ******* She gives enough time to listen to all concerns and explains everything in details.  She always encouraged for normal delivery, ultimately we needed a caesarean section delivery. The surgery was perfect without any complication. Due to her advice our journey was trouble free. Thanks for all the support.

review: I visited Dr. Jasmine for PCOS and was struggling to conceive, after 6 months of consulting her was able to conceive naturally. Throughout my pregnancy she was very friendly and supportive. I liked her approach of dealing with patient. She explains things very clearly and patiently listens to the problems. Never asks do to do unnecessary tests. Due to her support, I was able to deliver a healthy baby. So, I recommend visiting Dr. Jasmine.

Me and my family are always grateful for all the timely help she has done.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Hi All, 
On public health interest, I would like to share my bad experience with this doctor, we visited the doctor three-month back. Since from last three-month, we undergone numerous no. of blood tests, vagina tests and consume **** **** ***** ** medicine and spent huge money on this.
Eventually, we failed to conceived and its got miscarriage, I feel the pain when my wife went to a lot of pain while given blood test, getting high power injection, consuming **** ***** medicine, *** ** **** *** ****** ******* ******* ******* *** *** ********* ****** ******* *******
Its was disappointing, When we shared this experience, the doctor said its normal, * **** ** *** ** *** ** *** ***** ** *** **** ** **** ****** ********** **** **** ** ****** **** **** ** **** ****** My wife still feels pain, I don't what to do.

Request you to all please don't visit **** **** ** ****** ** *** ****** ***** **** ****
reply_text:
Becoz u didn't mention ur name, I don't know whether u visited me or not.but still whoever u r, this is for your information .         Whenever someone who doesn't not conceive naturally,they always come for medical help. All the test are done to rule out why some one does not conceive . To make formation of eggs, tablet and injection are given. Even after conceiving,to support pregnancy tablet are given.abortion is not in the hand of doctor. 
Giving life is only in god's hand,we can only help u out with present available technique.

Many of my patients conceive and gone through similar treatment and succeeded also.
There is consultation charges in every hospital and clinic which everyone pays. U can check in other fertility centre too.
If u have any abortion,u will have pain.if ur pain not decreasing ,then u have to come and consult me. Not writing and guiding the public here. 

Every one are quite educated here and they can know the doctor treatment very well.          

I have many patients,who I have helped in conceiving, guiding in pregnancy and delivering too. 

Few pt didn't conceive also. Every one is educated here and they know very well whether treatment and test are going right or wrong. If someone does not like treatment,they are free to consult other doctors. 
Even u have written such things by guiding public  (who are  intelligent and educated with every information), still I feel sorry for u bcoz u had a miscarriage. 
God help both of u to concieve.best of luck in your life and future.
Even best of the hands in the world may not bring life to the earth .
